<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes>fdacb518b7320110aab961d9ce11a989</includes><macroponent display_value="Service Centre Admin">fcdb4df8356a3910f877e159f0acd962</macroponent><name>Dashboard Widget Clicked</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
	const {getPayload} = imports['sn_app_analytics_w.ParWidgetsDrilldowns']();	
    const payload = getPayload(event);	
	api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', payload);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-14 04:20:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>4ddb4df8356a3910f877e159f0acd966</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Dashboard Widget Clicked</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Now Mechanic" source="x_1142001_now_mech">c49834594756b1107cb7057d826d439a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Now Mechanic">c49834594756b1107cb7057d826d439a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4ddb4df8356a3910f877e159f0acd966</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-14 04:20:14</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
